description_en: This grenade wreaks havoc with the perception of time in the area. All creatures in the area at detonation must attempt a Fortitude save. Those who succeed can act as though affected by a hastespell for 1d4 rounds, as long as they remain in the area of the grenade. Those who fail must act as though affected by a slow spell for 1d4 rounds or until they leave the area of the grenade.
